duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Materials Science Engineer in researching advanced steel and composite materials.
Understand the design parameters required for the materials used in vehicle designs.
Visit production facilities to learn how material choices impact assembly operations.
Become involved with the design studio to understand material selection for vehicle interiors.
Present findings and examples of alternative materials that could be implemented into vehicle designs.

education_certification.credential: Must be enrolled and pursuing a degree in Mechanical or Chemical Engineering at an accredited school and have completed 30 semester hours of undergraduate studies.
